excerpt: "But with opportunity comes complexity. Navigating AI as an investment isn’t just about acknowledging its transformative power; it’s about discerning genuine prospects from mere hype. Exchange Traded Funds (ETFs) are a perfect way to leave the complexity to the professionals and gain exposure to this technological evolution."
